Trade/Device Name(s): Safety Blood Collection Needles with/without Needle Holder
Submitter Information: Anhui Hongyu Wuzhou Medical Manufacturer Co., Ltd.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Safety Blood Collection Needles with/without Needle Holder intended for venous blood collection and prevention of accidental needlestick injuries.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to be used with vacuum blood collection tubes for multiple collections of venous blood; safety shield is intended to aid in protection against accidental needle stick injuries.
